title: Talk With Your Voice
new: You can now talk with your voice. NOTE: Mic is always muted by default when joining the call.
fixes: Fixed a bug that prevented you from joining another call while already being in a call.

title: Welcome Popout
new: Added a welcome popout for newly registered users. This can also be re-shown in settings > account.

title: Vue 3
changes: Migrated to Vue 3
body: There may be some bugs hiding. Please report them if you find some c:

title: Calling BETA
new: Added support for calling in any server channel.
body: Calling Interface may have issues and may not be final. Screen share support only.

title: HTML Profile!
new: Add some HTML and CSS to your profiles!

title: Tab Improvements
new: Tabs are now saved even after reloading the page.
See which tabs have new notifications.

title: Order Tabs
new: You can now reorder tabs by dragging them.

title: Image Preview Changes
new: New buttons to open the image in a browser or download the image
changes: Image preview should show images bigger

title: Tab Improvements
new: Added icons and avatars to tabs

title: Tab Improvements
fixes: You can now scroll though tabs on mobile without opening the drawer.
new: Middle click on a tab to close it.
Sending a message should automatically open the tab.

title: Tabs (Beta)
new: Open chat in tabs inside Nertivia!
body: Double click on a tab to make the tab stay opened.

title: Title Improvements
changes: Browser title has been improved to prepare for an upcoming feature!

title: Doodlepad
new: Added a doodlepad (thanks to bree!)

title: Responsive Image Upload Dialog
changes: Image upload dialog is now responsive and should fit on small screen devices.

title: Small Design Changes
new: Navigation bar now displays text under the title
changes: Changed selected server design

title: Updates To Changelog
new: Changelog can now contain preview images/GIFs
changes: Updated changelog Design

title: Small Improvements and fixes
new: You can now highlight and copy messages in the desktop app.
fixes: URL embeded images would not load.

title: Small Visual Changes
changes: Input box, drop down menu and context menu slight design changes

title: Cache Input
new: Input now saves when switching channels.
Message counter now shows when there is more than 4000 characters.

title: Markup Improvements (by bree)
new: Links surrounded with < and > like <https://example.com> will hide the containing characters and the embed
Added a new markup expression to allow for vertical text
body:
The new markup can be used like:
[vertical: text that is vertical two spaces indicate a newline ]

title: YouTube Embed Improvement!
fixes: YouTube embed now plays the video at the specified time in the URL using the time query.

title: Font Picker!
new: Added a font picker. The font can be changed by going to: settings > interface.

title: 12-hour time
new: Added 12-hour time format. This can be enabled in settings > interface.

title: Small Design Changes
changes: Changed the design of radio box
Changed the design of check box

title: Socket.IO 4
changes: Updated to socket.io version 4. without this update, Nertivia would not be able to connect.

title: Markup Guide
new: Added markup guide and can be accessed through settings.

title: Markup colors! (by bree)
body:
To add color to your text, use the following syntax 
[#hex-color | "reset"]text
Example: 
[#f8f]pinkish text [#reset]normal text
new: You can now add color to your messages through markup.

title: Reacted Users List
new: You can now see who reacted to messages by hovering over a reaction. Full list popout coming soon.
Alt + Shift + Up/Down to switch between unread channels. (Thanks to Toby)

title: Message Reactions!
new: You can now react to messages!

title: Markup Inside Quotes
changes: Markup now works inside quotes.

title: Highlight Code blocks!
new: Code blocks can now be highlighted.
Copy to clipboard button for code block.
changes: Changed background color of inline code block.

title: Changed navigation behavior
changes: [Mobile] Navigation bar now pins at the bottom when the message logs are not showing.
Dashboard now has a smaller drawer.

title: Detach CSS Editor
new: You can now detach the CSS editor which makes it easier to make/edit themes.

title: Bug fix
fixes: Fixed quote message not scrolling to the correct place.

title: More Markup Syntax (by bree)
new: Use `code` in addition to ``code`` to create code text.
Use both _italic_ and *italic* in addition to //italic// to create italicized text.

title: Quote Redesign
new: Quotes have been redesigned.

title: DM Header Upgrades
new: Username is now clickable in the DM header
Added avatar image, user presence and custom status in the DM header.
Button to cancel message edit.

title: New Mention Design
changes: New Mention design.
fixes: Some bugs have been fixed.

title: Server Channel Icons
new: You can now add emoji/custom emoji icons to your server channels
Quick access to channel settings by right clicking on a server channel.

title: Public Themes
new: You can now publish your CSS themes.

title: Stable
new: Added download app button

title: Donate Links & Home Page Changes
new: Added Ko-fi donation link to settings <3
Added 'View Changes' button to the home page.
Changed Home Page design slightly

title: Bug fixes, Small Features
new: Reset single color in the interface settings.
Added typing status background color to interface settings
fixes: Emoji picker not toggling.

title: CSS Themes
new: You can now create CSS Themes through the interface setting. Ability to share themes is coming soon!

title: Bug Fix
fixes: Fixed a bug where when switching servers, last selected server channel would not save.

title: WIP Features
new: WIP Features can now be enabled through the settings when they are available.

title: Markup Spoilers (by bree)
new: Added spoilers to the markup

title: Bug Fixes
fixes: Profile Card would not show in mobile mode.
changes: As you can access the settings through the profile card, settings icon is now removed.

title: Language Support
new: Language support has been added to this app.
body: Help add more languages here.

title: Small Visual Changes
changes: Changed button design.
Slightly changed the input area background color

title: Profile Banners
new: You can now add a banner to your profile page.

title: Bug fixes
changes: Changed the ugly looking 'uniqueID' to 'user_id' and 'id'.

title: Bug fixes
fixes: When joining a server, everyone displayed as offline.

title: Added shortcuts
new: ALT + UP/DOWN: navigate between server channels
ALT + CTRL + UP/DOWN: navigate between servers

title: Server Visibility Option
new: You can now set your server visibility through server settings.

title: Drawers Upgrade
new: You can now hide the members drawer in desktop mode.

title: Explore Filter Options
new: Added filter options to explore server tab.

title: Markup Fixes (By bree)
fixes: Links no longer match unwanted or uneeded characters. Goodbye (https://example.com/) including the )
Complex emojis and emoji sequences are now supported
Custom expressions now properly add to the text count. No more large emojis when mentioning someone!

title: Bug Fix
fixes: Game status would not be emited after 3 minutes.

title: Program Activity
new: Added program activity page in settings.
fixes: Fixed a bug related to custom status and status
changes: Gif profile pictures and custom emojis now require you to pay a subscription that costs $99.99/month.

title: Added Badges
new: Added Badges. This is not fully completed but functional for now.

title: Profile Details
new: Add profile details such as your name, gender, age and more inside the accounts page in settings.

title: Change to Rate Limit
changes: Admins and owners are now immune from rate limited channels.

title: Bug Fix & Added Notices
fixes: Servers didn't get detected in the Delete Account page.
new: Added a notice in the explore server page.

title: Last Selected Server Channel
changes: Last Selected Server Channels will now be remembered.
Clicking on common friends now replaces the currnet profile popup instead of opening a DM.

title: Rate Limit Mode!
new: You can now set a rate limit on each channels through channel settings.

title: Link markup
new: Added links to the markup thanks to bree!

title: Delete Account (DONT)
new: New delete account option in settings is now available.

title: Bug Fixes
new: You can now easily see which role is default and which role is created by a bot.
Notice message now displays for the deafult and bot roles on the edit role page.

title: Bug Fixes
fixes: Added minimum bubble height
Close confirm link popout after clicking on 'visit'
Show confirm popout when clicking on a named link.

title: More Markup!
new: Added more markup thanks to bree!

title: Role Bug Fixes & Server Perfomance Improvements!
fixes: Server owner could not modify role permissions.
changes: Server is now running in 4 clusters. This means that the server will be more responsive.

title: More Drawer Improvements!
changes: You can now swipe to open the drawers (mobile only)

title: Faster Drawers
changes: Changed the code for drawers. They should open way quicker on a mobile device.
Do not automatically show keyboard on mobile.

title: Fixed Overflow
fixes: Fixed overflow for the custom status.

title: Role Priority
changes: Roles now have a priority. low priority roles cannot modify the higher priority roles.

title: Verified Servers
new: Servers that are verified now have a checkmark.

title: Block Users
changes: Clicking on a friend in friends list or clicking on a setting option should now close the drawer on mobile.
new: Open server context menu from the drawer header.

title: Block Users
new: You can now block users from the profile popout. Blocking the users will prevent them from interacting to you.

title: Server Invite Page
new: Added invites page.
fixes: Fixed some bugs throughout the code.

title: Fixes And Changes
changes: Invite links should now use MainAppURL
fixes: You can now scroll through the server channels list.

title: Desktop App Badge
new: Notifications will now show a red badge for the electron app.

title: Edit Bot Commands
new: You can now edit bot commands in the manage bots page in settings.

title: Come Back! :(
new: You can now unban members from a server through the server settings page.
Right clicking on a mentioned user should now display a context menu.

title: Fixed Bug
fixes: Clicking on a user in manage users would take you to an incorrect user.

title: Common Servers & Friends
new: You can now see common servers and common friends in the profile popout.
changes: Changed version numbering to be semantic
Slightly changed the way how updates are checked and displayed.

title: Video Embed
new: Uploaded MP4 videos and YouTube URL links now show an embed inside Nertivia.

title: Bots
new: You can now create & invite bots.
fixes: Fixed some minor bugs.

title: Close DM Channels
new: You can now close DM channels

title: Google Drive Link
new: Added link with Google Drive popout
fixes: Fixed some minor bugs.

title: Small Changes
new: Added electron title bar WIP. You won't be able to see it yet though as the electron app is not released yet.
changes: Removed border radius from left side header.

title: Delete Server
new: You can now delete your server through server settings.
changes: Made changes to the changelog header.

title: Create Server Bug Fix
fixes: Creating a server would throw errors.

title: Small Changes
changes: Popouts with buttons now use the custom button template.

title: Changelog
new: Added a changelog GUI which will be shown automatically. You can also view the changelog through the settings page.
changes: Changed border radius in some places.

title: Update Checker
new: Added a changelog. Will hopefully make a GUI for it next.
Added an update checker. Nertivia will check for updates every hour when interacting.
